channel.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Riz Ahmed Reveals He Was Hospitalized After His Body “Gave Up” While Filming ‘Rogue One’
item.description: The actor recalled experiencing a “silent and intense” health scare while filming the 2016 ‘Star Wars’ movie.

item.title: Riz Ahmed Reveals He Was Hospitalized After His Body “Gave Up” While Filming ‘Rogue One’
item.description: The actor recalled experiencing a “silent and intense” health scare while filming the 2016 ‘Star Wars’ movie.

item.title: Riz Ahmed Explains How a Real-Life Robbery Inspired ‘Relay’ Role and Why He’s Glad He Didn’t Appear on ‘Andor’
item.description: The ‘Rogue One’ star joked to ‘Andor’ creator Tony Gilroy that he should get a consolation prize for not being on the show: “Does that mean I’m getting a Bodhi Rook standalone movie?”

item.title: Riz Ahmed Explains How a Real-Life Robbery Inspired ‘Relay’ Role and Why He’s Glad He Didn’t Appear on ‘Andor’
item.description: The ‘Rogue One’ star joked to ‘Andor’ creator Tony Gilroy that he should get a consolation prize for not being on the show: “Does that mean I’m getting a Bodhi Rook standalone movie?”
